name: Terminal Theme for IRCCloud [highlight mod]
description:
This theme started as modification of the wonderful Terminal Theme for IRCCloud by kirbylover4000 (version 2.0), just to fix the bright red text highlighting. 

Now it has a life of its own.

I recommend using Source Code Pro font, link to Source Code Pro font (free/libre):
http://store1.adobe.com/cfusion/store/html/index.cfm?event=displayFontPackage&code=1960
